squidpony.squidtext

Class StringUtils

    • squidpony.squidtext.StringUtils

  • @Beta
public class StringUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Based on work by Nolithius available at the following two sites https://github.com/Nolithius/weighted-letter-namegen http://code.google.com/p/weighted-letter-namegen/
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

      • levenshtein

        public static int levenshtein(java.lang.String word1,
                              java.lang.String word2)
        Computes the Levenshtein distance between two words. Cost of operations is assumed to be 1. Implemented from algorithm found in http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Levenshtein_distance
        Parameters:
        word1 - The first word to compare.
        word2 - The second word to compare.
        Returns:
        The Levenshtein distance between the two words.

      • levenshtein

                              int deleteCost,
                              int insertCost,
                              int removeCost)

      • damerau

        public static int damerau(java.lang.String word1,
                          java.lang.String word2)
        Computes the Damerau-Levenshtein distance between two words. The Damerau-Levenshtein distance is the same as the Levenshtein distance, except it counts transposition of adjacent letters, as 1. For example, the Levenshtein distance of "time" vs. "tiem" is 2, but the Damerau-Levenshtein distance is 1, since only one operation occurred: transposition. Implemented from algorithm found in http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Damerau-Levenshtein_distance
        Parameters:
        word1 - The first word to compare.
        word2 - The second word to compare.
        Returns:
        The Damerau-Levenshtein distance between the two words.
